title: MD
biography: Pedro González Alonso is a Spanish actor, writer, and artist. He is best known for his role of Andrés "Berlin" de Fonollosa in the Spanish heist series Money Heist and its spin-off Berlin, and for the role of Diego Murquía in the historical drama series Gran Hotel.
aiSummary: Pedro Alonso is a prince of asturias award specialist with an H-index of 116 at WHOEpidemiology (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, The Lancet Infectious Diseases, Nature Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
